title: Organization Contact Info
description: This is 1 of 4 forms as part of the organization data gathering.

fields.label: Physical Address (If physical address is different than above)
Organization Email
fields.description: Please do not enter a personal email.

fields.label: Organization Phone
fields.description: Please do not enter a personal phone.

fields.label: Hidden Fields
fields.description: DO NOT EDIT. The fields are hidden from the user but are critical for the form to function.

fields.label: Status
fields.description: Mark the Status as Completed to Skip the Approval Process

fields.label: New Account?
fields.description: This is used to determine if this is the first time the record has been updated. If so, it will walk the user through each of the forms sequentially. Once edited for the first time, this will update to 'No'.

fields.label: Date Created
fields.description: The date the Service Provider post was created.

fields.label: Last Updated
fields.description: The date the Service Provider post was last updated (now).

fields.label: Contributor Name
fields.description: The User ID of the current editor.

fields.label: Contributor Role
fields.description: The Role of the current editor.

fields.label: Contributor User ID
fields.description: The Display Name of the current editor.

fields.label: Assign Partner
fields.description: The user assigned as the 'Approver' of the updated entry. Only users with a Contributor Role of service provider or service provider contributor need to have their edits reviewed.

fields.label: Post ID
fields.description: The ID of the Service Provider record that is created or updated.

61f9714a8db0c.name: Default Confirmation
61f9714a8db0c.message: Your Organizational Details have been submitted for review! Your changes will take effect once the information provided is approved. If the information is rejected you will receive a notification in your inbox.
61f9714a8db0c.url: Your Organizational Details have been submitted for review! Your changes will take effect once the information provided is approved. If the information is rejected you will receive a notification in your inbox.

62192cc482331.name: If New Account
62192cc482331.message: Your Organizational Details have been submitted for review! Your changes will take effect once the information provided is approved. If the information is rejected you will receive a notification in your inbox.

meta.description: The workflow starts when the user submits the form.

Once the form has been submitted, the Partner Organization must review and either Approve or Reject the submission. If Rejected the Service Provider is notified and allowed to update their entry to resubmission. If Approved, the entry is saved and the workflow is completed.
meta.instructionsValue: Instructions: Please review the values in the fields below and click on the Approve or Needs Revision button. If updates are needed then the Provider will receive a notification to update their entry. You will need to review once more prior to approving and finalizing their updates. If there are minor changes to be made, simply approve their update and then edit their record directly.
meta.assignee_notification_message: A new entry is pending your approval. Please check your Workflow Inbox.
meta.rejection_notification_message:
Your entry has been reviewed by your Partner and requires some revisions. Please review the notes below and make the necessary updates. 
{workflow_note}
You can update your entry from your {workflow_inbox_link}.
meta.processed_step_messageValue: This link is no longer valid.

meta.description: If Approved, the Service Provider's record is updated and the workflow is then completed.
If rejected, the Service Provider should get the change to revise their input and resubmit.
meta.instructionsValue: Instructions: Please review the feedback from your Partner organization and make the appropriate updates and resubmit the form.
meta.assignee_notification_message: A new entry requires your input.
meta.in_progress_notification_message: Entry {entry_id} has been updated and remains in progress.
meta.complete_notification_message: Entry {entry_id} has been updated completing the step.
meta.confirmation_messageValue: Thank you. Your Partner will review and process your entry.
